title: Great Sand Dunes National Park & Preserve: Ranger Programs
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Ranger Programs              Ranger Programs         Summer evening programs at Great Sand Dunes' open-air amphitheater include images and videos on the large screen. NPS/Graham Oden  Free Ranger Programs Your visit can be more enjoyable when you better understand the environment around you. Ranger programs are offered most days throughout summer months, and occasionally during other times of the year. You may request a special program for a larger group by calling the Visitor Center at 719-378-6395, or send an email.  Program schedules below are usually posted each Friday for the following week: Program Schedule August 7-13, 2016 (pdf) Program Schedule August 14-20, 2016 (pdf)
